name: multimode
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(especially of a device) able to operate in different modes (= ways): This is a multimode digital modem. The camera has a built-in multi-mode flash.
internet & telecoms
  specialized A multimode optical fibre is a type of wire used to send communication signals. It is able to carry signals as light in different modes (= ways): The first two generations of commercial fibre-optic systems use multimode fibres.
More examplesFewer examplesThe vehicle has a new five-speed, multi-mode automatic transmission. The group has a multi-mode transportation network throughout the US, Canada, and Mexico. LEDs are a major light source for optical fibre transmission used with multimode optical fibre.
